entries.title: Monetary Policy - BCRP
entries.text: The BCRP follows a policy of Explicit Inflation Targets. The inflation target (a range between 1 and 3 percent) seeks to anchor inflation expectations.

entries.title: Working Papers - BCRP
entries.text: The working papers of the Central Reserve Bank of Perú are preliminary research documents disseminated to motivate discussion and analysis.
